text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump I hope Trump spends his day in quiet contemplation of the 117,591 American souls lost to Coronavirus. 

A big number of those deaths are on him. And him alone. 

No wonder he's so stooped over. 

He has no love for me. I'm a Dem. He hates all Dems. 

#TrumpLiesAmericansDie
